name: handle_http_request
description: If the user requests to send an http request, you need to capture the http method and request content, and then call this function to send the http request.

request_url.description: The http url that is requested. It can be an absolute url that starts with 'http' or 'https', or a relative url that starts with '/'

http_method.description: The http method that is requested, e.g., GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE.

request_content.description: The http request content. It must be in serialized json string.
